website_summaries.verdict: We love its retro charm, the wide handles, and the affordable price.
pros: Good for smaller dishes, good price, and the wide handles make it easy to pass
cons: Also, that lid stays hot for longer than you'd think

customer_reviews.title: Time Will Tell
customer_reviews.text: I gave a rating of three stars because the older Etch 1.5 quart with glass cover that I have has developed a crack from the center to the corner of the casserole. I believe also that buyers of this product should be aware that it is no longer a true Corning Ware product. They are now made in China and I believe quality-control is no longer that of the original Corning Ware cookware. Only time will tell if the first casserole was an anomaly or if these casseroles are of mediocre quality.
customer_reviews.author: Darian

customer_reviews.title: SKIN DEEP
customer_reviews.text: Do be careful with the Etch line. They do not resist breakage as well as the other corning products. I have several of these now, and they don't stack well either. The lids do not fit tight, and they have a tendency to fall off, so be aware. However, this dish is great for cooking and serving in the same dish, and looks very nice with other dishes in a covered dish supper or event. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharona.D

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this, as I believed the size would be perfect for my boyfriend and me. When I received it, I thought that the glass top was cheap but if I was careful, the size of the casserole dish was just what I was looking for. After cooking in the over at 350 degrees Fahrenheit for 30 minutes, the ceramic split all the way down the side. Wholly unusable. Absolutely waste of money. Extremely low quality product. Wish I never ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the listed dimensions
customer_reviews.text: The product is listed as 12.5" x 8.5". Even the outside dimensions with the handles do to account for 12.5". The bottom surface is 8" x 5" which is kind of small. I will keep it but was expecting something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Imitation of Classic CorningWare.
customer_reviews.text: CorningWare has been a classic for decades. Unfortunately, it is no longer economical for Corning to manufacture and they have taken to selling cheap imports that do not have the look and feel of classic CorningWare. It works OK. Corning has more important products to make, such as the Gorilla Glass for smart phones.
customer_reviews.author: Indian Cook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for oven, microwave or fridge
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the old white with blue flowers Corning Ware casserole to replace one I had lost which was given to me for a wedding shower gift 46 years ago, not realizing they apparently are not available any more. This one caught my eye because of the color which I loved. I have used it in the oven, to store things in the fridge, and to take a meal to my invalid sister. I am fully satisfied with it and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Mom

customer_reviews.title: I love this dish!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this dish for nearly a year now. I use it maybe once a week to make baked mac and cheese, which means it goes into the oven at 350 degrees F for 30 to 45 minutes at a time. I've had absolutely no problems whatsoever. It's easy to clean, the glass lid is very study (I've dropped it twice in the sink by accident while hand washing and have seen not even a crack). Overall, I am super happy with my purchase. This dish seems like it will last for a good number of years :}
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: at a price that was good, and delivered very promptly
customer_reviews.text: This Corning Ware Etch Square Dish is exactly what I was looking for. It was delivered yesterday, Sunday December 28th. Many thanks Amazon. Once again you had what I wanted and needed, at a price that was good, and delivered very promptly. This and other reasons are why I shop at Amazon and have for a number of hears and shall continue to. Also, when there has been a problem, very rarely, you have always protected me as a buyer, and gone to bat for me when it was necessary. Thank you very much, you have a customer for life. Dr. Stan Schaeffer
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: You are not going to like this one.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very poor replacement for the earlier 1.5 square dish. The lid will not stop an exploding chile bean and will fall of while you are carrying dish with food inside I will keep it as it is the only 1.5 L that I have with a "sort of " cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse E. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and effective casserole dish.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little casserole dish. The lid is pretty invisible when set on the counter as it is clear glass with just the white handle/knob. It's the perfect size for small vegetable dishes both in the oven and microwave. So far I have no complaints, and I do think the color is great. I also bought it because it came with the glass lid. A lot of casserole dishes don't come with a cover.
customer_reviews.author: clarabelle

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean, going to give away
customer_reviews.text: I have used CorningWare since 1962. I decided to upgrade to this shape of dish from my OLD large square one. Even using parchment paper lining, food makes stains in this Etch bowl to the extent of half an hour of scrubbing afterwards, inside and outside the rim. Now that it's clean again, I'll donate it and look for another type (NOT made in China, good luck to me). Maybe from Canada or Germany. Too bad about CorningWare's outsourcing and/or lowered specifications.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice dishes that I purchased for my kids for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Nice dishes that I purchased for my kids for Christmas. Somehow one of them ended up with a crack inexplicably. Since I didn't examine them when packaging for Christmas, I don't know if it happened before or after Christmas. Either way, this seems to indicate that they might be a bit on the fragile side since they were not dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Moore

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I expected for the price. I guess I didn’t pay attention to the quart size. But it is very pretty on the table when serving.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila W

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Corning
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a Corning kitchen product break during use. That is, for 62 years. Sorry this one says not to use on the stovetop but, I can get around that. The dish is perfect for microwave use, great lid can be turned a bit to allow steam to escape for new sensor cook and reheat micro's. Easy to clean in Dishwasher. What more can be said? It is Corning, or what is left of the original company.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Koch

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but also consider comparable items
customer_reviews.text: Well-made, nicely sized, good for baking or storing food. The large handles do make it easier to manipulate, but make it a bit more difficult if you're trying to fit it into a crowded fridge. Would I buy another one? I think it's priced a bit on the high-side, considering the alternatives -- I also bought a Pyrex 2qt for less than half the price of this one, which serves my needs just as well.
customer_reviews.author: CSX

customer_reviews.title: Corning Ware has always been my perfect go-to! I have Corning Ware with the floral ...
customer_reviews.text: Corning Ware has always been my perfect go-to! I have Corning Ware with the floral designs I purchased over 25 years ago and they are still perfect! These are even more useful in that the great colors definitely can make it the center of attention--
customer_reviews.author: Judith G. Genier

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great casserole dish! Broke my first one and really missed it. Searched for another one. Elegant looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Pratt

customer_reviews.title: A lovely little cooking piece...
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE this dish - so pretty, so functional, perfect size for mac and cheese for us - love love LOVE the colour and appearance. My ONLY downgrade is that if you use it in the regular oven, be SURE to use an oven 'glove' to lift the lid - and it stays hot way too long, I got a little finger burn after it had been out of the oven for several minutes. Corning, are you listening? Other than that, this pattern of Cornings is my favourite yet. And SOOO easy to clean! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: WonderWoman

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Useful Product
customer_reviews.text: The brick color is beautiful. I agree with some other reviewers that the lid is lighter than in early models - but it's nice to have a lid. Casserole itself is sufficiently weighty. Very attractive and useful product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Matthias

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Some design usses.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Use it every day. Handle gets very hot. Handles on the side would be helpful to avoid accidently dropping when hot.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Larson

customer_reviews.title: CorningWare Etch 1.5 Quart Casserole Dish
customer_reviews.text: This casserole dish is the perfect size for a small casserole. It's a really pretty and practical serving dish and one of excellent quality. A nice addition to my CorningWare Etch collection.
customer_reviews.author: Susie L

customer_reviews.title: I ma happy with this casserole
customer_reviews.text: I ma happy with this casserole. My only concern is that the edge of the lid does not have the protective heavier glass ridge around the edge that the old corning ware had. This new edge is very clean-looking, and I like the design visually, but I am concerned about the lid chipping and breaking over time.
customer_reviews.author: Summergirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Recommended but wish lid was more secure.
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Only complaint is that the edges are shaped in away that allows lid to fall off easily when slightly tipped. I am afraid it will fall to the floor and break at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah G.

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: 2.5 quarts is an excellent size for guest casseroles. For Just my family of 4 would be a smaller size. The handles make it so easy to take out of the oven and carry. The lid is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and contemporary, but will it be durable?
customer_reviews.text: The dish is a handsome sand color. The lid is more contemporary looking, but far thinner and more fragile appearing than the CorningWare piece it is replacing. I'll withhold judgment on how durable this set will be.
customer_reviews.author: GPsy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the lid .
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, good size but the lid does not fit well at all.
customer_reviews.author: swood

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I would have liked. The lid if VERY fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the size is perfect for newlyweds
customer_reviews.text: This was a wedding gift off the bride's registry so I didn't really choose it. However, the size is perfect for newlyweds; I know she will use this over and over for mac and cheese or whatever. I have one the same size which is 50 years old and still in use, although the lid broke years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd

customer_reviews.title: works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to replace the one I lost in house fire. Only thing is I worry that the glass top will end up getting broken, wish it had some type of frame around edge to make it more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Greene

customer_reviews.title: LOVE OUR CORNINGWARE
customer_reviews.text: The mate for the four piece set I bought my wife earlier. Great product, good looking and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Garry C. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Cute!
customer_reviews.text: What a cute dish for serving veggies, sides, & dips! This was a little smaller than I imagined but, it was a Christmas present requested by the receiver so she got what she wanted. The price was lower than our local outlet store. This is part of a classic "go with anything" set of casserole dishes and has the good quality you expect with this brand. Did not come in a CorningWare box, if that is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: D. Deigh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and stylish dish from Corning Ware
customer_reviews.text: I have the matching 2.5Q version as well. Very stylish and of course functional!
customer_reviews.author: B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect just what my mom wanted to finish up the 4 piece set I got her for Christmas! The color in the pic doesn't do it justice!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: casserole
customer_reviews.text: This item was very nice and just the right size for lots of baking. The dish was very good in value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Judith E. Polan

customer_reviews.title: Fine addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed when our old one cracked :(
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: This is a very simple but beautiful dish. They come in various sizes
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple but beautiful dish. They come in various sizes. I plan on adding to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Olga harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Have several pieces of Etch design and love them! Great cooking AND cleanup!
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: At last some CorningWare with style
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a covered dish that was not too heavy. This is it. A little more style than just plain glass or plain white.
customer_reviews.author: Nugatorius

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and nice size (a little smaller than I expected) ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and nice size (a little smaller than I expected) but perfect for a family of four for a vegetable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Maglich

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Five stars because my daughter told me she loves this dish and wants the same one in the other sizes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: We have others of these that are bigger and needed one smaller, Works good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sabala

customer_reviews.title: pretty dish
customer_reviews.text: nice quality can't wait to start using it matches my other items perfectly
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: So handsome. If I were a bride, I'd ...
customer_reviews.text: So handsome. If I were a bride, I'd be sure to get the whole set of these. My only fear is that the handles stick out and could maybe break off with really use.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Arana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these serving dishes. Easy to clean and look great on the table
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Big fail
customer_reviews.text: Like others, my issue is with the lid. First, it provides no seal. While I wouldn't expect it to be air tight, there are gaps between the lid and dish that are big enough for a fly to stroll through unencumbered. If someone were to ever knock a glass over splashing a liquid over the top of the lid, all of it would end up inside the dish. The lid also doesn't sit evenly over the top of the dish. Instead, it teeters back and forth on the high points. As far as lids go, this one is a big fail. Having said that, this 1.5 qt square casserole dish looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brad W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice dish at a great price looks good on the table too
customer_reviews.author: ben klink

customer_reviews.title: great style and function
customer_reviews.text: Really like the color and style of etch dinnerware. Love that it can be used from oven to table top.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect transaction and I LOVE the dish. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: K.N.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous! I bought as many as I could!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Wish they would start making this whole line of dishes in green again!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: nice but ...
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately, the glass top of the container does not fit as well as i would like. but very nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking serving dish with clean lines and a modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: The red of this is very pretty! The picture does not show this. It is just the right size to make green bean dish.
customer_reviews.author: JBell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE COLOR
customer_reviews.text: So glad that corningware has updated the design and now offers such great colors. Performance is still there, and as always is a breeze to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Emory

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking casserole dish
customer_reviews.text: The size will be really useful. The color is very eye-catching.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Ede

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter - she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Wysong

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was needing
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and weight of the casserole dish, but found the lid a little too lightweight....afraid it might break easily.....
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice cookware!
customer_reviews.text: The dishes work well and look really nice. My wife has used these to cook a variety of casseroles and dips.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice but had a nik on the side of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flaw in the finish
customer_reviews.text: The first one shipped was broken, so I can't review that. Immediately replaced but this time there was an unpainted spot where it's supposed to be green. I would have asked for a replacement, but it was a gift and didn't have time to wait for another one (and what if the replacement also has a flaw?) Since I wasn't the final user, can't comment on how it performs.
customer_reviews.author: ASA

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Got the first one and it was packaged in with the cookware????? Broken of course, ordered a replacement and that one was broken as well. Will not order a 3 rd one very pretty color
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: "Etch" series NOT made by CORNINGWARE
customer_reviews.text: This is what I discovered when I looked at the back of the cardboard band that held the dish & glass cover: the "Etch" label is a trademark of WKI Holding Company, Inc. Used with permission by World Kitchen, LLC. The trademarked name "CorningWare" is used by World Kitchen under license from CORNINGWARE. Therefore, "CorningWare/Etch" is made and distributed by World Kitchen, LLC -- and manufactured in China. By coincidence, while shopping at my local branch of a popular national warehouse club this week, I found this same 1-1/2 Quart set and the 2-1/2 Quart model, together, at just under $50.00.
customer_reviews.author: BeenThereDoneThat

customer_reviews.title: Review goes to the missing second order
customer_reviews.text: The recent review goes to the missing second order not the nine inch casserole
customer_reviews.author: Carol Fecker

customer_reviews.title: ... ago at Costco and this piece had become my favorite. I wore it out and was heartbroken
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a set of these several years ago at Costco and this piece had become my favorite. I wore it out and was heartbroken. I found it alone on amazon. It is just the right size for our family. The lid closes tight and is well made. Goes through the dishwasher and color holds after hundreds of washing. Goes from refrig to oven no problem. This is a classic and will always be in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Viren

customer_reviews.title: Makes a wonderful gift, I want one myself.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this gift I send her she wanted more to match it. She particularly loves the design and color, it's lovely to serve in. The handles are convenient and make it easier to handle with hot pads. I ordered it on Amazon.com, got free shipping and it arrived two days later at her house. I send all my gifts this way now, it's so easy to put in the gift receivers name and address and have it send directly there. The price is about right for a CoringWare item, I still have old Corningware from the 70's I use everyday. This item is a winner, it's a go to items for gifts for me from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma7

customer_reviews.title: Casserole dish
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice casserole dish. It hold heat well and is a nice size for just about anything you want to bake. I love the handles it makes this dish easier to get out of oven or microwave.
customer_reviews.author: mafu

customer_reviews.title: One of My Fav's
customer_reviews.text: This dish was to replace another one like it just in a different color. It is a nice size for one or two people and it will fit into my Ninja all in one oven/slow cooker, stove top device. I use this often. Not sure why it is no longer being made. It is pretty on the table plus cooks very well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: I'm loving this brand.
customer_reviews.text: I've recently begun collecting pieces of Corningware because I like their designs and the quality of their products is really good. One tip I'd give people worried about storing the lid is to invert it using the plastic case it came in - protects the knob and glass. This casserole dish is really nice and I appreciate the convenient handles. Straight from the oven to the table, what's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: BlueSphere

customer_reviews.title: Needs extended top as a handle
customer_reviews.text: Good quality dish, but is difficult to handle, without a lip.
customer_reviews.author: Bun

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but lid doesn't fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but the lid is not a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except no broiler
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, size, and shape. I bought it to use for Thanksgiving Yam dish, which has to go under broiler at the end for the marshmallows. The directions say not to do this. So, I just put it in the oven on bake, without the lid and the marshmallows browned beautifully! I can't remember if this can go in the microwave or not?
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Its the perfect size for a small lasagna or hotdish for my kids and I. The pant is gorgeous and amzon shipped it fast and perfect. I bought it from Kohls first and theirs arrived shattered :-( I do think this color is kind of plain.. definitely not gray like I thought.... simple beige. the green is nice and the purple is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Cadeley

customer_reviews.title: ... oven next to my regular oven and these fit great. (None of my Pyrex would fit in that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny "side" oven next to my regular oven and these fit great. (None of my Pyrex would fit in that oven.) The lid is nice if I want to make something ahead and put it in the refrigerator and the design is nice as well. I have had no issues when cooking with them.
customer_reviews.author: QwickStart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful just right for me and my little girl won't ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful just right for me and my little girl won't get to try them til I move so looking forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: Michiko L. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Two of Us
customer_reviews.text: The 1 1/2 qt covered casserole is perfect for my husband and me. Goes from oven/microwave to table to dishwasher. Cleans easily and looks nice on the table to help keep our food warm while eating. Love the red!
customer_reviews.author: CA GA Peach

customer_reviews.title: Loved the small cassarole dish
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was having a hard time finding a small cassarole dish. They all were 3 qrts or larger. This fit the bill, came in recored time and was priced so low. It was wrapped so tight in bubble wrap.....I will order from you again. Thanks, Cindy from Wisc
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for casseroles
customer_reviews.text: This size is perfect. I have one smaller and one larger. Neither works very well for meal type casseroles. This one is perfect! I love the lid too. The handles are a nice touch and make it easier to put in and take out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C

customer_reviews.title: Nice CorningWare update.
customer_reviews.text: Nice corningware update. Not too bad to clean. Shape is a bit odd making storage not as convenient as older shapes. Looks quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: W from Chicago Metro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful product that I use to cook roasted potatoes in; bought it to compliment its 2 1/2-quart brother.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works well for steaming veggies in the microwave
customer_reviews.author: Annie Gundersen

customer_reviews.title: Will be great to use every day and for potlucks
customer_reviews.text: Fast service and securely packaged. Will be great to use every day and for potlucks.
customer_reviews.author: mary ward

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Corningware Casserole with Glass Cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this caserole dish because it's deep and the see through glass cover makes the food inside look enticing when on the talbel as well as keeps it hot. Excellent purchase and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Diane J. Pacitto

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my baking dishes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and price. I use this for casseroles, roasts and many other recipes. It cleans beautifully and it looks nice on the table, too.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Great Casserole Dish
customer_reviews.text: Great looking casserole dish, can go from oven to the table.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good luck!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this item shattered, and in pieces all over the inside of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: CorningWare 2 1/2 inch dish.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 7 piece CorningWare set and love it, but needed this size. I am very happy with the quality of the dish and color.
customer_reviews.author: duane

customer_reviews.title: CorningWare 2-1/2 Quart Casserole - Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter-in-law. She wanted a covered casserole dish and I bought this one since her kitchen is green and this matched. I also have always liked CorningWare.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Who can go wrong with anything made by Corning ware.
customer_reviews.text: All good. This was a replacement for one that went missing.
customer_reviews.author: SESBOB

customer_reviews.title: A great look with easy functionality
customer_reviews.text: I have always enjoyed these dishes, and was happy to find them out in the red. Very useful and handy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a Christmas and was pleasantly surprised. Great serving piece. It was a good value also. Wanted the rest of the set.
customer_reviews.author: aheff

customer_reviews.title: I can't see the glass cover lasting long. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't see the glass cover lasting long. The glass cover is so thin. I can't see it lasting long.
customer_reviews.author: joan giuliano

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! It's easy to clean, doesn't leave any food stains. The color is neutral and perfect for just about any kitchen and it's easy to carry from oven to table.
customer_reviews.author: TamL

customer_reviews.title: Well made and inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mother for Xmas. She absolutely loves it! Very well made product and reasonably priced. Shipping was great! Product arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: cute cassarole
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra small cassarole & this is very nice. Great when I need to make something for someone who is on a restricted diet.
customer_reviews.author: ROSANNE WALKER

customer_reviews.title: food baked turned out well and easy to clen
customer_reviews.text: Didn't require many muscles to clean after baking for over an hour,,,dish is great,,,not sure with the lid,,,,never have baked anything with the lid on yet...Very well pleased...
customer_reviews.author: lynne mccarver

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew if I would have liked it.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look and style of this dish , but I never could get one sent to me that wasn't broken in transit. Very tiring to have to send back broken items
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: It is not up to the standard I have been used to with Corning Ware. The old corning ware was more useful since it can go from the TOP of the stove or oven to the table for serving.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time Broken -Sloppy Packaging -  REALLY ? You Sell breakable items and cannot even pack them properly ?
customer_reviews.text: Really ? You Sell breakable items and cannot even pack them properly ? I travel a lot and was not able to open the package until today . Returns expired Aug 16 . And I am travelling again so will have to return this later. I did not expect a broken item from a brand like CorningWare . Extremely sloppy and dissapointing. I wonder what CorningWare is going to do about this. I should write and article in my blog to trace how CorningWare is going to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Maki Meiji

product_meta.title: CorningWare Etch 2.5 quart Oblong Dish with Glass Cover in Sand
product_meta.description:
CORNINGWARE ETCH 2.5-QUART SQUARE DISH WITH GLASS LID IN SAND
The original CorningWare bakeware which was first introduced in 1958, was made of a glass-ceramic material that could be used on the stove, in the oven and under the broiler. After World Kitchen acquired the brand in the late 1990's, CorningWare products were switched to ceramic stoneware production. Introduced later that year was the French White collection, which has been an all-time best seller among brides-to-be. 

The CorningWare stoneware collections can be used in conventional, convection and microwave ovens as well for storing food in the refrigerator and freezer. It washes easily by hand or in the dishwasher. Non-porous, stoneware won't absorb food odors and resists staining. And it's non-reactive so acid-based foods can be prepped or baked in it. CorningWare bakeware, a perfect blend of style and function, is designed to be used for convenient same-dish baking and serving, whether for casual or formal dining.

Creative, versatile, transforming- CorningWare etch bakeware gives you the edge. Premium crafted stoneware with artisan details and design that exhibits your good taste and fresh style. And, etch is CORNINGWARE bakeware so you know you can count on its high quality and performance. 

 * The collection is designed with gently flared edges and easy-grip handles to make the dishes easy to clean and to handle. 
 * High-gloss interiors.
 * Textured surface conveys hand-made, artisan quality.
 * Microwave, dishwasher & oven safe.
 * Blends with existing CorningWare pieces.
 * 1-Year Warranty. 

CARE AND USE

All CorningWare stoneware bakeware items are breakable. Failure to follow instructions may result in personal injury or property damage.

CorningWare stoneware bakeware can be used for serving and reheating food. Some stoneware bakeware can be used in microwave, convection and pre-heated conventional oven. Some items may not be appropriate for specific uses. Review information on bottom of items prior to use.

Wash by hand or in automatic dishwasher. Load dishes to avoid bumping against other items during cycle. To remove gray or rust marks, clean with a non-abrasive cleanser. If scouring is necessary, use only plastic or nylon cleaning pads with non-abrasive cleansers. Do not allow stoneware dinnerware to soak/stand in water for an extended period of time. Applied heat after soaking may cause crazing.

WARRANTY

World Kitchen, LLC promises to replace any stoneware bakeware item or glass cover with a manufacturing defect within one year from date of purchase. Accidental breakage from impact is not covered. For this warranty to apply, the owner must follow the safety and usage instructions.
